document.full_text: thousands of mourners called on saturday for "revolution" at the funeral of protesters killed by syrian security forces, in the boldest challenge to syria's rulers since uprisings began sweeping the arab world.
document.title: syrian mourners call for revolt, forces fire tear gas
lines_and_colors: thousands of mourners called on saturday for "revolution" at the funeral of protesters killed by syrian security forces, in the boldest challenge to syria's rulers since uprisings began sweeping the arab world.
